title: @ Riot Region Icon
body:
What happened to Region Icon?

There were piltover, Zaun and Demacia icons

Are others not going to be made, or were they made but i didnt noticed?

replies.body: The region specific icons were available for a limited time through the [Universe ](http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/)site, and not obtainable in-game.  I don't have any additional info about them coming back or new ones moving forward, but stay tuned to the Universe site should it return.  Sorry!

There are only Piltover, Zaun and Demacia? 
Or are there more but i just didnt noticed?
